name: Terrorform (itch)
description:
Game made for AGBIC2019 in 2 weeks.

TERRORFORM 

Famicom case made by Pavilion｜Graphic Designer  In the wake of Earth’s collapsing ecosystem, the wealthy are evacuated from the dying planet in tiers relative to their capital. You are sent to the lowest tier; the moon, un-terraformed, which you must colonise in the shadow of the dying Earth

Your mission is to colonize the moon. What they don't know is that you are a Demon thirsty for blood, and this is the perfect oportunity to begin you reign of terror. 
Get blood by killing humans and cows yo create Blood Vials. Get 5 of those and you win. But beware! The population and the Church will become suspicious.
